short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides access to administration features when using ConferenceManager with Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ConferenceManager Administration extension should be installed by administrators that want to configure ConferenceManager / Active Directory synchronization with the Chrome browser.  The extension provides access to the Windows Users and Groups selection dialog to allow specific Active Directory users and security groups to access to the ConferenceManager application.
